title: Promo - One Minute German
description: Welcome to One Minute German. In this podcast you'll be learning just enough German to get by on holiday or on a business trip to a German-speaking country, or just to impress your German-speaking friends. Each lesson includes just over one minute of language-learning content, so there's no excuse not to learn! Remember, even a few phrases of a language can help you make friends and enjoy travel more.
